welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Plainville, the charming town known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all the city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Central Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at North Central Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at T. F. Green Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at T. F. Green Airport serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at T. F. Green Airport serves domestic flights operated by JetBlue and Southwest.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
